## matchRequestSlotToSlotTypeValue() function

Match the request slot to the provided slot type values.

Both synonym and value are used, whichever has the highest score is returned.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function matchRequestSlotToSlotTypeValue<T>(slot: RequestSlot, slotTypeValues: SlotTypeValue<T>[]): SlotTypeValue<T> | undefined;
```

|  --- | --- | --- |
|  slot | [RequestSlot](./stentor-models.requestslot.md) |  |
|  slotTypeValues | [SlotTypeValue](./stentor-models.slottypevalue.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;\[\] |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

[SlotTypeValue](./stentor-models.slottypevalue.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt; \| undefined
